metrics: McKinsey (2025): ~78% of orgs use AI in at least one function; ~71% use gen‑AI somewhere.
Work Trend Index (2025): ~29% of leaders save ≥1 hour/day with AI; workforce split on ‘tool vs. partner’.
Private AI investment (2024): ~$250B+ total, continuing to rise into 2025 (various indices).
posts.takeaway: Impact tracks workflow redesign, not tool count. Formalize governance, train for new ‘AI teammate’ norms, and measure time‑to‑value on a few high‑leverage processes first.
